abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Country is United States of America", "TaxonKey is Trichechus manatus Linnaeus, 1758" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Mammal specimens 1 records from TTU Mammals Collection 1 records from UCM Mammal Collection (Arctos) 1 records from PSM Vertebrates Collection 1 records from NMNH Paleobiology Specimen Records 1 records from CRCM Vertebrate Collection 1 records from CHAS Mammalogy Collection (Arctos) 1 records from DMNS Mammal Collection (Arctos) 1 records from CM Vertebrate Paleontology Collection 1 records from University of Michigan Museum of Zoology, Division of Mammals 1 records from SBMNH Vertebrate Zoology 1 records from Ohio State University Tetrapod Division - Mammal Collection (OSUM) 1 records from Naturhistorisches Museum Mainz, Zoological Collection 2 records from LSUMZ Mammals Collection 2 records from CNMA/Colección Nacional de mamíferos 2 records from USGS Patuxent Wildlife Research Center Seabirds Compendium 2 records from Biodiversity Research and Teaching Collections - TCWC Vertebrates 2 records from Canadian Museum of Nature Mammal Collection 2 records from MVZ Mammal Collection (Arctos) 2 records from Angelo State Natural History Collections (ASNHC) Mammal specimens (Arctos) 2 records from UAM Mammal Collection (Arctos) 2 records from HSU Vertebrate Museum Mammals Collection 2 records from Natural History Museum (London) Collection Specimens 3 records from Vertebrate Zoology Division - Mammalogy, Yale Peabody Museum 3 records from KUBI Mammalogy Collection 4 records from Paleobiology Database 6 records from Palaeobiology - Vertebrate Comparative Osteology Collection - Royal Ontario Museum 6 records from Field Museum of Natural History (Zoology) Mammal Collection 8 records from Diveboard - Scuba diving citizen science observations 8 records from Macaulay Library Audio and Video Collection 15 records from naturgucker 19 records from AMNH Mammal Collections 20 records from Mammals Specimens 20 records from MSB Mammal Collection (Arctos) 22 records from UWBM Mammalogy Collection (Arctos) 25 records from Mammalogy Collection - Royal Ontario Museum 30 records from Museum of Comparative Zoology, Harvard University 31 records from CAS Mammalogy (MAM) 46 records from LACM Vertebrate Collection 47 records from NCSM Mammals Collection 69 records from Palaeobiology - Vertebrate Fossils Collection - Mammalia - Royal Ontario Museum 145 records from NatureServe Network Species Occurrence Data 148 records from NMNH Extant Specimen Records 481 records from University of Florida Vertebrate Paleontology 994 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations
